comments:
Build F2

If a project is deleted, but referenced by others which prereq a classfile 
folder from it, and which happens to be missing; the following NPE may occur 
while the project is being deleted.

!ENTRY org.eclipse.core.resources 4 2 Jun 04, 2002 18:53:53.837
!MESSAGE Problems occurred when invoking code from plug-
in: "org.eclipse.core.resources".
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException

(DeltaProcessor.java:1784)

There is no protection on the delta findMember action since the target root is 
missing.

Steps:

1. Define P1
2. Define P2
3. Add P2/lib folder
4. Prereq P2/lib folder on P1 classpath
5. In navigator, delete lib folder from P2
6. In package view, delete P2 project
Could not reproduce the NPE following the steps above.
